a1: Avatars are deterministically generated from your input text using a hash function. The same text always produces the same avatar.
a2: Two styles: Pixel (symmetric identicon grid) and Geometric (abstract shapes with overlapping circles and rectangles).
q3: Can I use these avatars commercially?
a3: Yes, the generated avatars are created algorithmically and are free to use for any purpose.
q4: What is the maximum avatar size?
a4: You can generate avatars up to 512x512 pixels.
